name: Emo Quest XD
description:
- Contains only the first Chapter.       
   - I'll be rebalancing it based on the comments you all post below! Like the encounter rates, level up system, or even the NPCs dialogues.
   - This is my passion project I've been working on during my free time, I'll keep working on it.
   - Next release will be when Chapter 04 is finished.  
   - Only available for Windows at the moment, but I'll also try making it to Linux and Mac later on.
   -Any suggestions or problems with the demo just comment here or message me on Twitter about it! 

Credits:

   -Pixel Art, Programming, SFX, OST and Game made by Thiago Avidos. If you want to support me there's also my Ko-fi.

  -Monster designs all done by me back in 2008 when I was a kid!

  -Game made using the LÖVE framework!
